offset.name: offset
offset.description: offset into a collection of resouces if the offset is 5 the query is asking for the result set to start with the fifth resource in the collection

limit.name: limit
limit.description: limit the size of the results of a collecction. The result set will contain at most limit resources

asOf.name: asOf
asOf.description: a date in the form of 'YYYY-MM-DD' or a date specification, such as 'Today', 'Yesterday', or '10 years ago', that will filter the resulting resources to be resources that are effective as of the date provided.

400.description: Invalid Request - unable to interpret request

409.description: Query parameters conflict or are malformed
